text:
Proxying to a https server with certificate CN different from actual domain will in 2.4 return "500: Proxy Error (Error during SSL handshake with remote server)" to client.

Required config change:
SSLProxyCheckPeerCN off

I think it should be a note in the upgrade doc, as 2.2 didn't react to this.
creator: petterb@gmail.com

text:
SSLProxyCheckPeerCN as well as SSLProxyCheckPeerExpire  defaults to on in 2.4 (both defaulted to off in 2.2, as you mentioned), so you would likely get the same error if your certificate had expired. I have put a mention of this in the upgrade docs.

Thanks!
Daniel.
creator: humbedooh@apache.org
